## Description
This package uses the Kolada API to get data about temporary parental benefits in the Swedish cities of Stockholm, Gothenburg, Uppsala, Lund and Link√∂ping. Kolada provides data from Swedish municipalities and the id for the data accessed with this package is N00945.

## Import
```{r setup}
library(lab5package)
```

## Initialize
Use lab5package::kolada("city"), where "city" is one of the cities covered within this package to get the data of that city.


## Methods

### meandata()
Gets the mean of the percentage of temportary parental benefits for males in the city that has been initialized.

### getallcitydata()
Can be used as long as any city has been initialized. Provides a data frame of the data from all the cities covered.
